item.title: Making noise in Python
item.description: I’ve been working with PyAudio lately, on a project to synchronize sound streams across multiple devices. Nothing to say on that front yet, but I do have a nice snippet for programatically generating a tone: import math import numpy import pyaudio def sine(frequency, length, rate): length = int(length * rate) factor = float(frequency) * (math.pi * 2) / rate return numpy.sin(numpy.arange(length) * factor) def play_tone(stream, frequency=440, length=1, rate=44100): chunks = [] chunks.
